title: Цена свободы
author: Ponamarenko Yroslav
description:
Yaroslav Ponomarenko is a representative of academic realistic school. In very symbolic form, the artist shows that the freedom is destined for those who have wings. This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'The Price of Freedom' is related to surrealism being a representative of fantasy genre.

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
